channel.title: Monte carlo on Open Operational Research
channel.description: Recent content in Monte carlo on Open Operational Research

item.title: Life & Death part 1
item.description: Motivation As I just had another birthday with a ‘0’ at the end, I’m thinking about how long I have left.And it relates to other forecasts I could make, like will I ever pay off my student loans? The ONS publish national life tables under the OGL, so we have the data, and the permission to use it. And straight away I can see that the average UK 30-year old male has about 50 years left.
